title: The Maintenance Orders (facilities For Enforcement) Act
title_en: The Maintenance Orders (facilities For Enforcement) Act

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. TMs Order may be cited as the Maintenance Orders (Deolaration
of Reciprocating States) Order, 1988.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. The States specified in the Schedule are hereby declared to be        Schedule.
reciprocating States for the purposes of the Act.
          Antigua and Barbuda
          The Bahamas
          Belize
          Cayman Islands
          Cook Islands
          Dominica
          Grenada
          Baliwick of Guernsey
          Guyana
          Isle of Man
          Jersey
          Montserrat
          New Zealand
          Niue
          St. Chfistopher and Nevis
          St. Lucia
          St. V i n m t and the Grenadines
          Trinidad and Tobago
          United Kingdom
          British Virgin Islands
          Western Samoa
